venue.name: Microsoft New England Research & Development Center (NERD)

item.description:
Our November BizSpark Meetup will be held on Tuesday, November 24th at Microsoft Research Center located at One Memorial Drive in Cambridge. The security officer will direct attendees to the correct floor. There is also parking available at a cheap evening rate in the building. Parking is also free on the street in front of the building at 6 PM.

At 6:30 PM Greg Hill of Excellira will give us an overview of search engine optimization best practices and his own tricks of the trade. You can learn more about Greg Hill at http://excellira.com...

After the presentation | demonstration, we will go around the room introducing ourselves and asking the group for advice | opinions on any startup-related issues members are facing.

Microsoft will provide pizza. What a generous organization!

Please RSVP and bring guests.
item.name: Search Engine Optimization Overview with Greg Hill of Excellira
